info.name: Conduit
info.description:
Collection for testing the Conduit API

https://github.com/gothinkster/realworld

exec: tests['Global variable "token" has been set'] = pm.globals.get('token') === user.token;
tests['Review\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.createdAt);
tests['Review\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.updatedAt);
tests['Review\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(review.tagList);
tests['reviewsCount is 0 when feed is empty'] = responseJSON.reviewsCount === 0;
tests['Review\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.createdAt);

body.raw: {"review":{"title":"How to train your dragon", "description":"Ever wonder how?", "body":"Very carefully.", "tagList":["training", "dragons"]}}

exec: tests['Review\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.createdAt);

tests['Review\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.updatedAt);
tests['Review\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(review.tagList);
tests['reviewsCount is 0 when feed is empty'] = responseJSON.reviewsCount === 0;
tests['Review\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.createdAt);
tests['Review\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.updatedAt);
tests['Review\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(review.tagList);
tests['reviewsCount is 0 when feed is empty'] = responseJSON.reviewsCount === 0;
tests['Review\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.createdAt);
tests['Review\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.updatedAt);
tests['Review\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(review.tagList);
tests['reviewsCount is 0 when feed is empty'] = responseJSON.reviewsCount === 0;
tests['Review\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.createdAt);
tests['Review\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.updatedAt);
tests['Review\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(review.tagList);
tests['An review was returned'] = review !== undefined;
tests['Review\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.createdAt);
tests['Review\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.updatedAt);
tests['Review\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(review.tagList);
tests['The first tag is dragons'] = review.tagList[0] === 'dragons';
tests['The second tag is training'] = review.tagList[1] === 'training';
tests['Review\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.createdAt);
tests['Review\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.updatedAt);
tests['Review\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(review.tagList);
tests['Review\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.createdAt);
tests['Review\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.updatedAt);
tests['Review\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(review.tagList);
tests["Review's 'favorited' property is true"] = review.favorited === true;
tests["Review's 'favoritesCount' property is greater than 0"] = review.favoritesCount > 0;
tests['Review\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.createdAt);
tests['Review\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.updatedAt);
tests['Review\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(review.tagList);

item.name: Reviews Favorited by Username with auth

exec: tests['Review\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.createdAt);
tests['Review\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.updatedAt);
tests['Review\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(review.tagList);
tests['Review\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.createdAt);
tests['Review\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(review.updatedAt);
tests['Review\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(review.tagList);
tests["Review's \"favorited\" property is false"] = review.favorited === false;
tests['"createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(comment.createdAt);
tests['"updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(comment.updatedAt);
tests['"createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(comment.createdAt);
tests['"updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(comment.updatedAt);

item.name: All Comments for Review without login

exec: tests['"createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(comment.createdAt);
tests['"updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(comment.updatedAt);
tests['Profile\'s "following" property is true'] = profile.following === true;
tests['Profile\'s "following" property is false'] = profile.following === false;
tests['"tags" property returned as array'] = Array.isArray(responseJSON.tags);
